ygData.subject: Jewelry Success Rates
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that successes and failures in jewelry are affected by your Wisdom level.  My Enchanter has a jewelcraft skill of 33 and a Wisdom of about 75+-.
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that successes and failures in jewelry are affected by your Wisdom level. My Enchanter has a jewelcraft skill of 33 and a Wisdom of about 75+-. I've found that I can make most of the silver jewelry, even the topaz, with more success than failures. Every once in a while I'll have a bad luck streak and fail 5 times in a row with something easy like Rose Quartz, but for the most part I have success.
When you are posting success or failure rates try posting your Wisdom level and skill level so we can compare.

Fren
Gnome, Enchanter
Tunare Server
